name: Mantle Block
description:
**YOUR MISSION IS TO FIND THE GEM ON THIS PLANET AND DIG IT UP, DESTROY AS MUCH OF THE PLANET AS YOU WISH TO ACHIEVE THIS. IT'S POSSIBLE YOU ARE THE BAD GUY, BUT ITS OKAY**

In Mantle Block you are the pilot of a drill who needs to mine all of the precious gems from a planet in the least amount of turns possible. 

Controls

WASD/ ARROW KEYS - Move and dig 

SPACEBAR - Dig through the world to the opposite side

THANKS FOR LOOKING AT THIS
